info.name: Yoga-GO API
info.description: Complete API collection for Yoga-GO platform with Cloudflare Stream video integration

request.description: Retrieve list of all yoga experts/instructors
Retrieve detailed information about a specific expert including their courses, certifications, and social links
Retrieve list of all available yoga courses

variable.description: Course ID (e.g., course-deepak-1, course-deepak-2, course-kavitha-1, course-kavitha-2)

request.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific course including curriculum, reviews, and requirements

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Advanced Vinyasa Flow",
  "description": "Master advanced vinyasa sequences and transitions. This course provides detailed instruction on advanced poses and complex transitions.",
  "instructor": {
    "id": "deepak",
    "name": "Deepak Kumar",
    "title": "Senior Yoga Instructor",
    "bio": "Expert bio...",
    "avatar": "/images/deepak.jpg"
  },
  "level": "Advanced",
  "duration": "12 weeks",
  "price": 149,
  "category": "Vinyasa Yoga",
  "tags": ["vinyasa", "flow", "advanced"],
  "thumbnail": "/images/course-thumbnail.jpg",
  "totalLessons": 0,
  "freeLessons": 0,
  "requirements": ["Prior yoga experience", "Yoga mat"],
  "whatYouWillLearn": ["Advanced poses", "Complex transitions"],
  "featured": false,
  "isNew": true
}

request.description: Create a new course. Course starts with status 'IN_PROGRESS'. Required fields: title, description, instructor (with id and name), level, duration, price, category.
Update an existing course. Can update any field including status. Set status to 'PUBLISHED' to make course publicly visible.
Delete a course and all associated lessons. Returns the count of deleted lessons.
Retrieve all lessons/videos for a specific course. Includes cloudflareVideoId and cloudflareVideoStatus for Cloudflare Stream videos.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific course lesson/video. Includes cloudflareVideoId and cloudflareVideoStatus.
Retrieve progress information for a course at a specific save point (guest mode)

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Introduction to Sun Salutation",
  "duration": "15:30",
  "description": "Learn the basics of Sun Salutation (Surya Namaskar)",
  "cloudflareVideoId": "abc123def456",
  "cloudflareVideoStatus": "ready",
  "isFree": true
}

request.description: Create a new lesson for a course. Use cloudflareVideoId from the video upload endpoint. Status can be 'uploading', 'processing', 'ready', or 'error'.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Introduction to Sun Salutation - Updated",
  "duration": "16:00",
  "description": "Updated description",
  "cloudflareVideoStatus": "ready",
  "isFree": true
}

request.description: Update an existing course lesson. Can update title, duration, description, cloudflareVideoStatus, or isFree flag.
Delete a course lesson. This will also remove the lesson from the course curriculum.
Retrieve list of all published webinars
Retrieve detailed information about a specific webinar including sessions, expert info, and feedback

item.name: Cognito Auth
item.description: Custom Cognito authentication endpoints for signup, login, and email verification

request.description:
Register a new user with Cognito. Password must be 8+ chars with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special char.

Required fields: name, email, password
Optional fields: phone (E.164 format), role, authToken

Response:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Signup successful. Please check your email for verification code.",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "requiresVerification": true,
  "userSub": "uuid-from-cognito"
}

Verify email with the 6-digit code sent to the user's email. If password is provided, auto-logs in the user.

Required fields: email, code
Optional fields: password (for auto-login)

Response:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Email verified and logged in successfully.",
  "user": { ... },
  "redirectUrl": "/app"
}

Authenticate user with Cognito and create a session.

Required fields: email, password

Response:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Login successful.",
  "user": {
    "id": "user-id",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "role": "learner"
  },
  "redirectUrl": "/app"
}

Error codes:
- USER_NOT_CONFIRMED: Email not verified (redirectUrl provided)

Resend the email verification code.

Required fields: email

Response:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Verification code sent to your email."
}
Retrieve all courses enrolled by the authenticated user
Retrieve detailed information about a specific enrolled course for the authenticated user
Retrieve progress information for an enrolled course at a specific save point (authenticated user)
Retrieve detailed user profile information including membership, statistics, enrolled courses, and achievements

item.name: User Webinars
item.description: Authenticated user webinar endpoints - view registrations, access sessions, submit feedback

request.description: Retrieve all webinars the authenticated user is registered for
Retrieve webinar details with session links (Google Meet) for registered users
Register for a webinar after payment. For free webinars, paymentId is optional.
Submit feedback for a webinar. User must be registered. Rating: 1-5, Comment: min 10 chars.

item.name: Discussions
item.description: Reddit-like discussion system for course lessons with voting, threading, and moderation

request.description: Retrieve all discussions for a specific lesson. Returns threaded discussions with replies, votes, and user information. User must be enrolled in the course.
Create a new discussion or reply to an existing one. Set parentId to null for top-level discussions, or provide a discussion ID to create a reply.
Retrieve all discussions across all lessons in a course. Optionally filter by lessonId query parameter.
Update your own discussion content. Only the owner can edit their discussions.
Delete a discussion. Users can delete their own discussions, and experts can delete any discussion in their courses.
Upvote or downvote a discussion. Click same vote again to remove. voteType must be 'up' or 'down'.
Moderate a discussion (experts only). Valid actions: pin, unpin, resolve, unresolve, hide, unhide. Only course instructors can moderate discussions in their courses.

item.name: Cloudflare Stream
item.description: Video upload and management endpoints using Cloudflare Stream

request.description:
Check the processing status of an uploaded video. Poll this endpoint after upload to check when video is ready.

Response:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "uid": "abc123def456",
    "status": "ready",
    "readyToStream": true,
    "duration": 123.45,
    "thumbnail": "https://...",
    "preview": "https://...",
    "playback": { ... }
  }
}

Status values:
- queued: Video is queued for processing
- inprogress: Video is being processed
- ready: Video is ready to stream
- error: Processing failed

item.name: Expert Webinars
item.description: Expert webinar management endpoints - create, update, manage sessions and registrations

request.description: Retrieve all webinars created by the authenticated expert

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Morning Yoga Flow",
  "description": "Join us for an energizing morning yoga session",
  "price": 49,
  "maxParticipants": 50,
  "category": "Vinyasa Yoga",
  "level": "Beginner",
  "sessions": [
    {
      "title": "Session 1 - Foundations",
      "description": "Introduction to morning flows",
      "startTime": "2025-01-15T06:00:00.000Z",
      "endTime": "2025-01-15T07:00:00.000Z",
      "duration": 60
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Create a new webinar. Starts in DRAFT status. Add sessions and then update status to SCHEDULED.
Get detailed webinar information including all sessions and registrations count
Update webinar details. When status changes from DRAFT to SCHEDULED, Google Meet links are created.
Delete a webinar and all associated registrations
Add a new session to a webinar. If webinar is SCHEDULED, a Google Meet link is automatically created.
Update a session. Google Calendar event is updated if linked.
Delete a session. Google Calendar event is also deleted if linked.
Generate Google Meet links for all sessions. Requires Google Calendar to be connected.
Generate Zoom meeting links for all sessions. Requires Zoom to be connected.
Get all registrations for a webinar with user details and status counts

item.name: Expert Inbox
item.description: Expert email inbox management - view and reply to emails sent to expert@myyoga.guru addresses

request.description: Retrieve paginated list of emails for the authenticated expert
Retrieve a single email by ID
Update read/starred status of an email
Send a reply to an email. Reply is sent from expert@myyoga.guru address.
Get a presigned S3 URL to download an attachment (5 minute expiry)

item.name: Google Calendar
item.description: Google Calendar OAuth and connection management

request.description: Check if the expert has connected their Google Calendar
Initiate Google OAuth flow to connect Calendar. Returns redirect URL.
Disconnect Google Calendar and remove stored tokens

item.name: Zoom
item.description: Zoom OAuth and connection management for webinars

request.description: Check if the expert has connected their Zoom account
Initiate Zoom OAuth flow to connect account. Redirects to Zoom.
Disconnect Zoom account and remove stored tokens

item.name: Admin Inbox
item.description: Admin platform email inbox management - view and reply to emails sent to hi@, contact@, privacy@myyoga.guru addresses

request.description: Retrieve paginated list of platform emails (hi@, contact@, privacy@myyoga.guru). Admin only.
Retrieve a single platform email by ID. Admin only.
Update read/starred status of a platform email. Admin only.
Send a reply to a platform email. Reply is sent from hi@myyoga.guru. Admin only.
Get a presigned S3 URL to download an attachment (5 minute expiry). Admin only.

item.name: Admin Waitlist
item.description: Admin waitlist management - view users who joined the waitlist

request.description: Get all waitlist signups with their email, name, and interests/thoughts. Admin only.
